item.title: Christopher Cross
item.description: Christopher Cross is an American singer, songwriter, musician, and composer from San Antonio, Texas. Cross won five Grammy Awards for his eponymous debut album released in 1979. The singles 'Sailing' (1980), and 'Arthur's Theme ' peaked at number one on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100. 'Sailing' earned three Grammys in 1981, while 'Arthur's Theme' won the Oscar for Best Original Song in 1981.
